definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: The high tension line inside the village uses unified string to divide each, cannot traverse a house owned by a citizen.
sentences.chinese: 村内高压线使用统一的线杆分到各户，不能横穿民房。

sentences.english: Wildebeests migrate in great herds across the Serengeti. The key to their mass movement is the rain.
sentences.chinese: 牛羚群要横穿塞伦盖蒂进行大迁移，其关键是雨水。

sentences.english: I don't think jaywalking is allowed .
sentences.chinese: 我不认为随意横穿马路是允许的。

sentences.english: She was partly to blame for failing to look as she crossed the road.
sentences.chinese: 她横穿马路时没有看车，应承担部分责任。

sentences.english: The post-office is only three blocks away.
sentences.chinese: 只横穿三条马路就是邮局。

sentences.english: The new main north-south road in Belize was cut through the forest only four or five miles away.
sentences.chinese: 一条纵贯伯利兹南北的路就在四五英里外横穿森林。

sentences.english: The little girl is afraid to go across the street.
sentences.chinese: 这个小女孩不敢横穿马路。

sentences.english: Highway 50 cut through an astounding forest of old-growth timber.
sentences.chinese: 50号公路横穿一片惊人的古木森林。

sentences.english: No hobgoblin appeared, although a black cat did try to cross my path.
sentences.chinese: 没有妖怪出现，只有一只黑猫企图横穿马路。

sentences.english: It lies to the north of Ascalon across a mountain range.
sentences.chinese: 它位于阿斯卡隆的北部，横穿一座山脉。

sentences.english: Let the Stapletons know that you' re going to walk home across the moor.
sentences.chinese: 让他们知道，您是打算横穿沼地走回家的。

sentences.english: The smooth topography is easy to work across at harvest time.
sentences.chinese: 平坦的地形有利于在收获时横穿畦田。

sentences.english: The policeman warned him against crossing the road at that place.
sentences.chinese: 警察提醒他不要在那个地方横穿马路。

sentences.english: Stop here to gas up before crossing the desert.
sentences.chinese: 横穿沙漠前要在这里停车加足汽油。

sentences.english: The little girl goes across the road.
Do you see those children jaywalking?
sentences.chinese: 你看见那些孩子横穿马路了吗？

definition: horizontal traverse/to cut across/to cross transversally
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to go through/to bore through/to push one's way through
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
to detour/to bypass/to circumvent/to avoid/to wind around (of a road etc)
